name: Manly Beach For The Soul
description: This trip combines an insider tour of one of Australia's most iconic beach towns with an extended life coaching experience designed to help you get clarity and direction in any area of life. Perhaps you want to brainstorm a new idea or workshop a challenge. Maybe you feel stuck and want guidance on how to live with more meaning. Laid back Manly is the perfect setting to do this. In addition to having a job where I get to help women make lasting life change, I've also been a Manly local for over a decade. I'll be taking you on a tour of my secret spots where along the way, inspired by the fresh air and healthy lifestyle, we'll devote time just to you and whatever's on your mind.
